article.title: Onyx-Ace to Provide Geographic Information System Services
article.text: Onyx-Ace Joint Venture LLC, Honolulu, Hawaii, is being awarded a $10,000,000 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for architect-engineer services for professional Geographic Information System services for activities at various locations primarily in the Pacific and Indian Ocean Areas.Â The maximum dollar value for the not-to-exceed 60-month period (including the base year and four one-year option periods) is $10,000,000. The Naval Facilities Engineering Command, Pacific, Joint Base Pearl Harbor-Hickam, Hawaii, is the contracting activity (N62742-14-D-0200).
